tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE room_availability (
    room_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    check_in_date DATE,
    check_out_date DATE,
    occupancy_status VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE OccupancyHistory (
    occupancy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_id INT,
    check_in_date DATE,
    check_out_date DATE,
    guest_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE reservation (
  reservation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  room_id INT,
  guest_name TEXT,
  check_in_date DATE,
  check_out_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE check_in (
    check_in_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    room_id INT,
    check_in_date DATE,
    check_out_date DATE,
    guest_id INT
);
